question: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.A: It is possible to volunteer with the police and become a special constable.

answer.text: You can volunteer with the police, and become a special constable or a lay (non-police) representative. You can also apply to become a magistrate. You will often find advertisements for vacancies in your local newspaper or on local radio. You can also find out more about these sorts of roles at www.gov.uk.

question: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.A: You can support your local community and the education of children by becoming a school governor.
options.B: You can support your local community and the education of children by becoming a school director.

answer.text: School governors are people from the local community who wish to make a positive contribution to children's education.

question: Why is it good for the environment to use public transport or walk?

options.B: It creates less pollution than driving a car
options.C: It leaves more space on the road for heavy goods vehicles
options.D: It makes the roads safer for animals and children

answer.text: Walking and using public transport to get around when you can is a good way to protect the environment. It means that you create less pollution than when you use a car.

question: Volunteering is a good way to earn more money.

answer.text: Volunteering is working to help others without payment. There are many benefits to volunteering, such as meeting new people and helping make your community a better place. There are many activities you can do as a volunteer, such as working with the homeless and helping improve the environment.

question: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.A: There are only a few charities in Britain, most of them national.
options.B: There are thousands of charities active in Britain.

answer.text: There are thousands of active charities and voluntary organisations in the UK.

question: Volunteering and helping your community are important parts of being a good citizen.

answer.text: Volunteering and helping your community are an important part of being a good citizen. They enable you to integrate and get to know other people.

question: It is possible to find out information about different political parties from their party websites.

answer.text: You can find out more about joining a political party from the individual party websites.

question: What is the upper age limit for being on a jury in the UK?

answer.text: As well as getting the right to vote, people on the electoral register are randomly selected to serve on a jury. Anyone who is on the electoral register and is aged 18-70 (18-75 in England and Wales) can be asked to do this.

question: Which of the following is a benefit of volunteering?

options.C: Having a chance to practise your English

answer.text: Volunteering is working for good causes without payment. There are many benefits to volunteering, such as meeting new people and helping make your community a better place. Some volunteer activities will give you a chance to practise your English or develop work skills that will help you find a job or improve your curriculum vitae (CV). Many people volunteer simply because they want to help other people.

question: Which of the following can volunteers help in?

options.C: Life in the UK test centres

answer.text: Activities you can do as a volunteer include: • working with animals -- for example, caring for animals at a local rescue shelter • youth work -- for example, volunteering at a youth group • helping improve the environment -- for example, participating in a litter pick-up in the local area • working with the homeless in, for example, a homelessness shelter • mentoring -- for example, supporting someone who has just come out of prison • work in health and hospitals -- for example, working on an information desk in a hospital • helping older people at, for example, a residential care home.

question: Which of the following is a good way of helping your community?

answer.text: Volunteering and helping your community are an important part of being a good citizen. They enable you to integrate and get to know other people. It helps to make your community a better place if residents support each other.
